pageTitle: Celo Careers: Build products for financial inclusion
joinUsStatement: Let’s build a monetary system that creates the conditions for prosperity for all
values1: We believe that everyone has their own unique path of growth, and that personal fulfilment depends in large part on being able to reach one’s potential along that path. We embrace values that enable people to grow towards their full potential:
valuesMotto: autonomy, individual accountability, thoughtful reflection, and long-term focus.
values2: At the same time, we believe that people live primarily in connection to one another. We recognize that individuals are healthier and happier when they are members of a strong social community with meaningful relationships – that is, when they are living within a healthy and happy whole. We embrace values that strengthen community:
valuesMotto2: kindness, empathy, wholeness, and mutual support.
values3: We aim for our internal culture, as well as the tools that we build, to reflect these core values.  As a team, we aim to make key decisions on a long-term time scale.
joinCeloStatement: To build technology and products that are used and loved by people and solve real-world problems, we need to build a team with many different perspectives and experiences.
buildAMonetarySys: Build a monetary system that creates the conditions of prosperity — for everyone
joinUsToCreateMoney: Join us to create money with meaning
selfMgmtWholeness: Networked leadership, wholeness, and evolutionary purpose
guidedBy: We’re guided by these practices and each new employee expands our culture
workOnCelo: Building a team comprised of diverse perspectives and experiences
noJobs: There are no open positions for this specific location or team
motivateSectionCopy: Our global financial system involuntarily excludes billions of people and we have the opportunity to create anew. We are starting small with a Wallet and it’s just the beginning.
We are building, and contributing to, an ecosystem that enables individuals and organizations to create solutions designed to include every community.

We’re working to empower the college student who is trying to build a foundation, the couple who struggles to save for retirement because of inflation, and the refugee who was forced to flee and has no identification.
comprehensiveBenefits: Comprehensive benefits for you and your loved ones
includeEveryoneCopy: We are intentionally building a company where everyone can belong. Our culture is a living organism,  expanding with each new team member. What perspectives could you bring to the team?
